quiz.question: _________ gleam
quiz.explanation: 微光,月光微光。The moonlight gleam reflected off the calm lake surface.月光微光在平静的湖面上反射。

quiz.question: _____ agleam
quiz.explanation: 闪闪发光,剑闪闪发光。The knight's sword agleam in the firelight looked magnificent.骑士的剑在火光中闪闪发光,看起来很壮观。

quiz.question: ream __ _____
quiz.explanation: 令,一令纸。The office ordered a ream of paper for the copier.办公室为复印机订购了一令纸。

quiz.question: ___ slipstream
quiz.explanation: 滑流,喷气机滑流。The racing car used the jet slipstream to gain speed.赛车利用喷气机滑流加速。

quiz.question: _____ sham
quiz.explanation: 假货,廉价假货。The expensive watch turned out to be a cheap sham.昂贵的手表原来是廉价假货。

quiz.question: ___ bedlam
quiz.explanation: 混乱,疯狂的混乱。The classroom descended into mad bedlam without the teacher.没有老师,教室陷入了疯狂的混乱。

quiz.question: roam ______
quiz.explanation: 漫步,自由地漫步。Wild animals could roam freely in the nature preserve.野生动物可以在自然保护区自由地漫步。

quiz.question: cram ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 临时抱佛脚,为考试临时抱佛脚。Students would cram for exam the night before.学生们会在考试前一晚临时抱佛脚。

quiz.question: deem _________
quiz.explanation: 认为,认为必要。The committee would deem necessary additional funding.委员会会认为必要增加资金。

quiz.question: teem ____ ____
quiz.explanation: 充满,充满生命。The coral reef would teem with life and color.珊瑚礁会充满生命和色彩。

quiz.question: proclaim _______
quiz.explanation: 宣布,宣布胜利。The general would proclaim victory after the decisive battle.将军会在决定性战役后宣布胜利。

quiz.question: exclaim ______
quiz.explanation: 惊叫,大声惊叫。The audience would exclaim loudly at the magic trick.观众会对魔术大声惊叫。

quiz.question: maim ______
quiz.explanation: 使残废,使受害者残废。The explosion would maim victim leaving permanent injuries.爆炸会使受害者残废,留下永久性伤害。

quiz.question: skim ____
quiz.explanation: 脱脂,脱脂牛奶。She preferred to drink skim milk to reduce calories.她更喜欢喝脱脂牛奶以减少卡路里。

quiz.question: brim ____
quiz.explanation: 边缘,满到边缘。The cup was filled brim full with hot coffee.杯子装满到边缘热咖啡。

quiz.question: fathom _____
quiz.explanation: 理解,理解深度。The sailors struggled to fathom depth of the ocean trench.水手们努力理解海沟的深度。

quiz.question: loom _____
quiz.explanation: 隐现,隐现得很大。Dark clouds would loom large on the horizon before the storm.暴风雨前,乌云会在地平线上隐现得很大。

quiz.question: ____ gloom
quiz.explanation: 阴暗,深深的阴暗。The economic news cast deep gloom over the market.经济新闻给市场蒙上了深深的阴暗。

quiz.question: zoom __
quiz.explanation: 放大,放大。The photographer would zoom in to capture facial details.摄影师会放大以捕捉面部细节。

quiz.question: _____ bosom
quiz.explanation: 胸部,知心朋友。She confided everything to her bosom friend since childhood.她向她从小的知心朋友倾诉一切。

quiz.question: ______ blossom
quiz.explanation: 花朵,春天的花朵。Cherry spring blossoms filled the air with delicate fragrance.樱花春天的花朵让空气充满了淡淡的香味。

quiz.question: accustom _______
quiz.explanation: 使习惯,使自己习惯。It takes time to accustom oneself to a new environment.使自己习惯新环境需要时间。

quiz.question: _____ forearm
quiz.explanation: 前臂,人类前臂。The human forearm contains two bones called radius and ulna.人类前臂包含两根骨头叫桡骨和尺骨。

quiz.question: _________ smarm
quiz.explanation: 谄媚,虚伪的谄媚。His insincere smarm fooled nobody at the meeting.他虚伪的谄媚在会议上没有骗过任何人。

quiz.question: ___ swarm
quiz.explanation: 群,蜜蜂群。A large bee swarm settled in the hollow tree.一大群蜜蜂在空心树上定居。

quiz.question: squirm ______________
quiz.explanation: 扭动,不舒服地扭动。The child would squirm uncomfortably during the long lecture.孩子会在长时间的演讲中不舒服地扭动。

quiz.question: deform ____
quiz.explanation: 使变形,使身体变形。The disease would deform body causing severe disabilities.疾病会使身体变形造成严重残疾。

quiz.question: _______ sarcasm
quiz.explanation: 讽刺,尖刻的讽刺。Her cutting sarcasm wounded him more than insults.她尖刻的讽刺比侮辱更伤害了他。

quiz.question: ____ chasm
quiz.explanation: 裂口,深深的裂口。A deep chasm separated the two sides of the canyon.深深的裂口分隔了峡谷的两边。

quiz.question: ______ spasm
quiz.explanation: 痉挛,肌肉痉挛。The painful muscle spasm made it difficult to walk.痛苦的肌肉痉挛使走路变得困难。

quiz.question: _______ heroism
quiz.explanation: 英雄主义,英雄主义行为。The firefighter's heroism act saved many lives.消防员的英雄主义行为拯救了许多生命。

quiz.question: _______ rheumatism
quiz.explanation: 风湿病,慢性风湿病。The elderly man suffered from chronic rheumatism in his joints.老人的关节患有慢性风湿病。

quiz.question: favoritism ______
quiz.explanation: 偏袒,偏袒政策。The boss's favoritism policy created resentment among staff.老板的偏袒政策在员工中引起怨恨。

quiz.question: _______ paroxysm
quiz.explanation: 突发,剧烈突发。A violent paroxysm of coughing shook the patient's body.剧烈突发的咳嗽震动了病人的身体。

quiz.question: ____ scum
quiz.explanation: 浮渣,池塘浮渣。Green pond scum covered the stagnant water surface.绿色池塘浮渣覆盖了死水表面。

quiz.question: ____ pandemonium
quiz.explanation: 大混乱,疯狂的大混乱。Wild pandemonium erupted when the team scored the winning goal.当球队打进制胜一球时,爆发了疯狂的大混乱。

quiz.question: ______ hoodlum
quiz.explanation: 流氓,街头流氓。A gang of street hoodlums terrorized the neighborhood.一帮街头流氓恐吓邻里。

quiz.question: ____ glum
quiz.explanation: 忧郁的,看起来忧郁。He would look glum after hearing the disappointing news.听到令人失望的消息后,他会看起来忧郁。

quiz.question: ____ candelabrum
quiz.explanation: 烛台,金烛台。The ornate gold candelabrum held seven candles.华丽的金烛台支撑着七支蜡烛。

quiz.question: _____ scrum
quiz.explanation: 并列争球,橄榄球并列争球。The players formed a tight rugby scrum to contest the ball.球员们形成紧密的橄榄球并列争球来争夺球。

quiz.question: ____ turban
quiz.explanation: 头巾,丝绸头巾。The man wore a traditional silk turban wrapped expertly.男人戴着熟练包裹的传统丝绸头巾。

quiz.question: ____ toboggan
quiz.explanation: 雪橇,骑雪橇。Children love to ride toboggan down snowy hills.孩子们喜欢骑雪橇滑下雪山。

quiz.question: ____ cardigan
quiz.explanation: 开襟羊毛衫,羊毛开襟羊毛衫。She wore a cozy wool cardigan over her dress.她在裙子外面穿了一件舒适的羊毛开襟羊毛衫。

quiz.question: _________ reptilian
quiz.explanation: 爬行动物般的,爬行动物般的眼睛。The villain had cold reptilian eyes that showed no emotion.恶棍有冷酷的爬行动物般的眼睛,没有表现出任何情感。

quiz.question: ______ disciplinarian
quiz.explanation: 严格执行纪律的人,严格的执纪者。The strict disciplinarian demanded perfect behavior from students.严格的执纪者要求学生完美的行为。

quiz.question: _____ horseman
quiz.explanation: 骑马者,勇敢的骑马者。The brave horseman rode into battle leading the cavalry.勇敢的骑马者骑马冲入战场带领骑兵。

quiz.question: ______ hangman
quiz.explanation: 刽子手,公开刽子手。The public hangman carried out executions in the town square.公开刽子手在城镇广场执行死刑。

quiz.question: ____ yeoman
quiz.explanation: 自耕农,自由自耕农。The free yeoman owned and worked his own small farm.自由自耕农拥有并耕种自己的小农场。

quiz.question: ________ barman
quiz.explanation: 酒保,友好的酒保。The friendly barman knew all the regulars by name.友好的酒保知道所有常客的名字。

quiz.question: ________ merman
quiz.explanation: 人鱼,神话中的人鱼。Legends tell of mythical merman living beneath the waves.传说讲述了生活在波浪下的神话中的人鱼。

quiz.question: _____ talisman
quiz.explanation: 护身符,幸运护身符。The soldier carried a lucky talisman for protection in battle.士兵携带幸运护身符在战斗中保护。

quiz.question: ________ chessman
quiz.explanation: 棋子,棋子。He carefully moved the chessman piece across the board.他小心地把棋子移过棋盘。

quiz.question: nonhuman _______
quiz.explanation: 非人类的,非人类灵长类动物。Scientists studied nonhuman primates to understand evolution.科学家研究非人类灵长类动物以了解进化。

quiz.question: moan ______
quiz.explanation: 呻吟,轻声呻吟。The injured patient would moan softly in pain.受伤的病人会因疼痛轻声呻吟。

quiz.question: bemoan ____
quiz.explanation: 悲叹,悲叹命运。He would bemoan fate instead of taking action.他会悲叹命运而不是采取行动。

quiz.question: ____ roan
quiz.explanation: 杂色的,杂色的马。The beautiful roan horse had a coat of mixed colors.美丽的杂色马有混合颜色的毛皮。

quiz.question: groan __ ____
quiz.explanation: 呻吟,痛苦地呻吟。The wounded soldier would groan in pain on the battlefield.受伤的士兵会在战场上痛苦地呻吟。

quiz.question: ____ __ saucepan
quiz.explanation: 炖锅,在炖锅里煮。She would cook in saucepan the soup for dinner.她会在炖锅里煮晚餐的汤。

quiz.question: _______ dustpan
quiz.explanation: 簸箕,簸箕刷。She swept the dirt into the dustpan brush and emptied it.她把灰尘扫进簸箕刷里并倒掉。

quiz.question: ___ suntan
quiz.explanation: 晒黑,太阳晒黑。She got a deep sun suntan from her beach vacation.她从海滩度假中得到了深深的太阳晒黑。

quiz.question: ________ tartan
quiz.explanation: 格子呢,苏格兰格子呢。The kilt was made from traditional Scottish tartan fabric.短裙由传统的苏格兰格子呢面料制成。

quiz.question: deaden ____
quiz.explanation: 减轻,减轻疼痛。The anesthetic would deaden pain during the procedure.麻醉剂会在手术过程中减轻疼痛。

quiz.question: ______ leaden
quiz.explanation: 铅灰色的,铅灰色的天空。The leaden skies threatened rain throughout the day.铅灰色的天空整天威胁着要下雨。

quiz.question: overladen ____
quiz.explanation: 超载的,超载的船。The overladen ship sat dangerously low in the water.超载的船在水中危险地坐得很低。

quiz.question: redden ______
quiz.explanation: 使变红,使脸颊变红。Embarrassment would redden cheeks instantly and obviously.尴尬会立即明显地使脸颊变红。

quiz.question: downtrodden ______
quiz.explanation: 被压迫的,被压迫的人民。The revolution aimed to liberate downtrodden people from tyranny.革命旨在将被压迫的人民从暴政中解放出来。

quiz.question: ______ sodden
quiz.explanation: 湿透的,湿透的衣服。His sodden clothes dripped water all over the floor.他湿透的衣服在地板上滴水。

quiz.question: ________ spleen
quiz.explanation: 脾脏,肿大的脾脏。The doctor detected an enlarged spleen during examination.医生在检查期间发现了肿大的脾脏。

quiz.question: ___ careen
quiz.explanation: 倾斜疾驶,汽车倾斜疾驶。The out-of-control car would careen down the hill.失控的汽车会倾斜疾驶下山。

quiz.question: preen ________
quiz.explanation: 整理羽毛,整理羽毛。The bird would carefully preen feathers with its beak.鸟会用喙小心地整理羽毛。

quiz.question: ____ tureen
quiz.explanation: 大汤碗,汤大汤碗。The hostess served from an elegant soup tureen.女主人用优雅的汤大汤碗上菜。

quiz.question: stiffen ____
quiz.explanation: 使僵硬,使身体僵硬。Fear would stiffen body in preparation for danger.恐惧会使身体僵硬以准备应对危险。

quiz.question: _____ ashen
quiz.explanation: 灰白的,灰白的脸。His ashen face showed the shock of the terrible news.他灰白的脸显示出可怕消息的震惊。

quiz.question: _______ earthen
quiz.explanation: 陶制的,陶制的罐。The traditional earthen pot kept water cool naturally.传统的陶制罐自然保持水凉爽。

quiz.question: _____ oaken
quiz.explanation: 橡木的,橡木的桌子。The sturdy oaken table had been in the family for generations.坚固的橡木桌子在家族中传承了几代。

quiz.question: reawaken ________
quiz.explanation: 重新唤起,重新唤起兴趣。The documentary would reawaken interest in ancient history.纪录片会重新唤起对古代历史的兴趣。

quiz.question: slacken _____
quiz.explanation: 放松,放松速度。The driver would slacken speed approaching the sharp curve.司机会在接近急转弯时放松速度。

quiz.question: _______ bracken
quiz.explanation: 蕨类,蕨类。Tall bracken fern covered the hillside in dense growth.高大的蕨类茂密地覆盖了山坡。

quiz.question: ________________ stricken
quiz.explanation: 受灾的,疾病受灾的。The disease-stricken region needed urgent medical aid.疾病受灾地区需要紧急医疗援助。

quiz.question: sicken _______
quiz.explanation: 使生病,迅速使生病。The contaminated food would sicken quickly those who ate it.受污染的食物会迅速使吃了它的人生病。

quiz.question: ______ silken
quiz.explanation: 丝绸的,丝绸的线。The spider spun delicate silken thread for its web.蜘蛛为它的网纺织精致的丝绸线。

quiz.question: ________ unspoken
quiz.explanation: 未说出口的,未说出口的规则。There was an unspoken rule about not discussing politics.有一个关于不讨论政治的未说出口规则。

quiz.question: _________ outspoken
quiz.explanation: 直言不讳的,直言不讳的批评家。The outspoken critic fearlessly challenged government policies.直言不讳的批评家无畏地挑战政府政策。

quiz.question: ________ unbroken
quiz.explanation: 未被打破的,未被打破的记录。The athlete maintained an unbroken record of victories.运动员保持着未被打破的胜利记录。

quiz.question: __________ crestfallen
quiz.explanation: 垂头丧气的,垂头丧气的失败者。The crestfallen loser walked slowly from the field.垂头丧气的失败者慢慢走离球场。

quiz.question: _______ swollen
quiz.explanation: 肿胀的,肿胀的脚踝。Her swollen ankle required ice and elevation.她肿胀的脚踝需要冰敷和抬高。

quiz.question: ______ sullen
quiz.explanation: 闷闷不乐的,闷闷不乐的心情。His sullen mood made conversation difficult and awkward.他闷闷不乐的心情使对话变得困难和尴尬。

quiz.question: misshapen ____
quiz.explanation: 畸形的,畸形的肢体。The birth defect resulted in a misshapen limb.先天缺陷导致畸形的肢体。

quiz.question: deepen _______
quiz.explanation: 加深,加深谜团。New evidence would only deepen mystery surrounding the case.新证据只会加深案件周围的谜团。

quiz.question: ______ pigpen
quiz.explanation: 猪圈,猪圈围栏。The farmer repaired the broken pigpen fence yesterday.农民昨天修理了破损的猪圈围栏。

quiz.question: dampen __________
quiz.explanation: 抑制,抑制热情。The negative news would dampen enthusiasm for the project.负面消息会抑制对项目的热情。

quiz.question: straighten __
quiz.explanation: 使变直,使变直。He needed to straighten up his messy bedroom.他需要整理他凌乱的卧室。

quiz.question: heighten _________
quiz.explanation: 提高,提高意识。The campaign aimed to heighten awareness about climate change.该运动旨在提高对气候变化的意识。

quiz.question: lighten ____
quiz.explanation: 减轻,减轻负担。Removing items would lighten load on the overloaded truck.移除物品会减轻超载卡车的负担。

quiz.question: frighten ________
quiz.explanation: 使害怕,使孩子们害怕。The scary movie would frighten children too young to watch.恐怖电影会使太小不能看的孩子们害怕。

quiz.question: hearten __________
quiz.explanation: 鼓舞,鼓舞支持者。The good news would hearten supporters after recent setbacks.好消息会在最近的挫折后鼓舞支持者。

quiz.question: hasten _________
quiz.explanation: 加速,加速离开。The approaching storm would hasten departure from the campsite.即将来临的风暴会加速离开营地。

quiz.question: glisten ____ ___
quiz.explanation: 闪光,露水闪光。The grass would glisten with dew in the morning sunlight.草在清晨的阳光下会因露水闪光。

quiz.question: christen ____
quiz.explanation: 命名,为船命名。The queen would christen ship by breaking a bottle of champagne.女王会通过打破香槟瓶为船命名。

quiz.question: smitten ____ ____
quiz.explanation: 被迷住的,被爱迷住。The young man was completely smitten with love for her.年轻人完全被对她的爱迷住了。
